TopicTitle: Game demo keeps crashing on Steam

Articles.Content:
I keep trying to play the demo but get an error message every time and the game asks if I want to reopen.

Error Message:

 \_\_TEXT 0000000000001000-0000000000bb6000 [ 11.7M] r-x/rwx SM=COW /Users/USER/Library/Application Support/Steam/\*/KSP.app/Contents/MacOS/Kerbal Space Program Demo

Thread 0 Crashed:: Dispatch queue: com.apple.main-thread

0 unity.Squad.Kerbal Space Program Demo 0x009f2863 operator delete(void\*, void\*) + 8465519

1 unity.Squad.Kerbal Space Program Demo 0x009f01a5 operator delete(void\*, void\*) + 8455601

2 com.apple.AppKit 0x9667d236 -[NSApplication \_modalSession:sendEvent:] + 1265

3 com.apple.AppKit 0x9667cc74 -[NSApplication \_realDoModalLoop:peek:] + 950

4 com.apple.AppKit 0x9667c8af -[NSApplication \_doModalLoop:peek:] + 207

5 com.apple.AppKit 0x9667b165 -[NSApplication runModalForWindow:] + 246

6 com.apple.AppKit 0x9667acce -[NSAlert runModal] + 202

7 com.apple.AppKit 0x963536a5 \_\_55-[NSPersistentUIRestorer promptToIgnorePersistentState]\_block\_invoke + 1380

8 com.apple.AppKit 0x96353107 -[NSApplication \_suppressFinishLaunchingFromEventHandlersWhilePerformingBlock:] + 80

9 com.apple.AppKit 0x9635308c -[NSPersistentUIRestorer promptToIgnorePersistentState] + 249

10 com.apple.AppKit 0x96352f80 -[NSPersistentUIManager promptToIgnorePersistentState] + 36

It might be an idea to try deleting the saved state data, as detailed in [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92228-Known-Issues-Self-Help). Apart from that... it's hard to say for sure. Can you see if it left a Player.log file we can look through?
